titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Majesty E. W., Gent.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. N. for Benjamin Allen ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes authorship to Edmund Waller.
A letter deprecating the impending civil war.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
